mapper.select: select e.* FROM( select (@rownum:=@rownum + 1) AS num,a.* from (select news_id,news_title,news_index,news_type,user_name,news_createTime,news_verifiedTime,news_updatedTime,news_level,news_status FROM news INNER JOIN users ON users.id=news.news_owner where news_status=1 order by news_level desc,news_index desc) as a ,(SELECT @rownum:=0) i ) as e limit #{index},#{limit}

select count(e.num) FROM( select (@rownum:=@rownum + 1) AS num,a.* from (select news_id,news_title,news_index,news_type,user_name,news_createTime,news_verifiedTime,news_updatedTime,news_level,news_status FROM news INNER JOIN users ON users.id=news.news_owner where news_status=1 order by news_level desc,news_index desc) as a ,(SELECT @rownum:=0) i ) as e

select e.* FROM( select (@rownum:=@rownum + 1) AS num,a.* from (select news_id,news_title,news_text,news_index,news_type,user_name,news_createTime,news_verifiedTime,news_updatedTime,news_level,news_status FROM news INNER JOIN users ON users.id=news.news_owner where news_status=1 order by news_level desc,news_index desc) as a ,(SELECT @rownum:=0) i ) as e WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.update: update news set news_level=#{news_level} where news_id=#{news_id}
update news set news_status=3 where news_id=#{news_id}
update news set news_status=1 where news_id=#{news_id}
update news set news_index=news_index+1 where news_id=#{news_id}
